name: species-estimate
title: Species Estimate
description: An estimation of the number of species for a given higher taxon, e.g. a family. The estimation must be based on a reference and should give the number of species according to a certain "type" that is expected to exist.

fields.name: taxonID
fields.title: taxonID
fields.description: The higher taxon's ID that is the estimate refers to.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.title: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the metadata.yaml

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: referenceID
fields.description: A mandatory reference ID that supports the estimate and also provides a temporal context.

fields.name: remarks
fields.title: remarks
fields.description: Remarks about the species estimate. Often used to explain the method used when the estimate is not directly taken from a publication.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: modified
fields.description: UTC timestamp in ISO format to represent the time the record was last modified.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.title: modifiedBy
fields.description: Author identifier indicating the person who has last modified the record.
